service1.title: Website & Web Application Development
service1.subtitle: For Businesses
service1.description: Design and development of modern websites and web applications built to support real business goals — not just visual presentation. Every solution is structured around usability, performance, and maintainability, with a clear focus on guiding visitors toward enquiries, bookings, or actions that matter to the business.

service2.title: Conversion & Lead Optimisation
service2.subtitle: Turning Visitors into Enquiries
service2.description: Improving how visitors interact with your website so more people take action — contact you, book a meeting, or make a purchase. This focuses on reducing friction, clarifying messaging, and aligning the site with how real customers make decisions, turning traffic into measurable business results.

service3.title: Local Visibility & SEO
service3.subtitle: Being Found on Google When Customers Search
service3.description: Search optimisation that helps your business appear where customers actively search for your services. This includes structuring your website and presence so you are visible on Google and map services at the moment potential customers are looking — not just ranking, but relevance.

service4.title: Advertising & Demand Capture
service4.subtitle: Google Ads & High-Intent Traffic
service4.description: Structured advertising designed to capture existing demand, not chase vanity metrics. Campaigns are built around clear conversion goals, targeting people who are already ready to enquire, book, or buy — with full visibility into what actually generates results.

service5.title: Analytics & Measurement
service5.subtitle: Understanding What's Actually Working
service5.description: Analytics and measurement architecture that shows what's working and what isn't. This provides clear insight into customer behaviour and performance, allowing decisions to be based on data instead of guesswork — and enabling continuous improvement over time.

service6.title: Technical Integrations & Automation
service6.subtitle: Reducing Manual Work & Friction
service6.description: Connecting platforms, tools, and workflows to reduce manual work and operational friction. From forms and bookings to email and internal systems, integrations are designed to improve efficiency, reliability, and the overall customer journey.

about.title: About Brehaut Consulting
about.description1: We specialize in creating digital solutions that drive real business results. Our approach combines technical expertise with a deep understanding of growth marketing and conversion optimization.
about.description2: Whether you need a modern web application, improved search visibility, strategic advertising, or seamless integrations, we work with you to build systems that scale with your business and deliver measurable outcomes.

items.question: How does working with Brehaut Consulting start?
items.answer: It starts with a conversation. You book a meeting through our booking system, and we discuss your business, goals, and current challenges. This helps us understand if we're a good fit and what approach would work best for you.

items.question: What happens during the first meeting?
items.answer: We listen to your situation, ask questions about your business and goals, and discuss what you're trying to achieve. It's a discovery conversation, not a sales pitch. By the end, you'll have clarity on whether we can help and what that might look like.

items.question: Can I hire you for just a website or just ads?
items.answer: Yes. While we often work on integrated systems, we can focus on a single service if that's what you need. We'll be honest if we think you'd benefit from additional services, but the decision is yours.

items.question: How is pricing structured?
items.answer: Pricing is based on project scope, complexity, and goals. We provide clear proposals after understanding your needs, so you know exactly what you're investing in and why.

items.question: Do you work internationally or only locally?
items.answer: We work with clients globally, with a focus on Europe and Latin America. Our services are delivered remotely, so location isn't a barrier as long as we can communicate effectively.

items.question: Who owns the website, ads, and data?
items.answer: You do. The website code, content, and any data collected belong to you. We work with third-party platforms when needed, but you maintain ownership and control of your digital assets.
